title: You`re Under Arrest The Movie
alternative_title: Taiho Shichau zo The Movie, 逮捕しちゃうぞ　the MOVIE
description: Bokutou Precinct rarely deals with criminals more nefarious than speeding sports car drivers. So when the officers Nikaidou Yoriko and Aoi Futaba find a cache of illegal firearms in a stolen car, and a rash of traffic control malfunctions snarls traffic along Tokyo's streets, it is up to Tokyo's finest to figure out what has gone wrong. And of course, it will take the talents of Kobayakawa Miyuki and Tsujimoto Natsumi to crack the case. But will Miyuki's trusty Mini-Pat and Natsumi's fierce determination be enough to stop a devious mastermind from exploiting the weaknesses of the system, crippling Tokyo — and the world — for good?
